dataJson.description: A project built for freecodecamp.com in 2016, the requirement then were to build a pomodoro clock
dataJson.name: Pomodoro Clock
dataJson.story: A pomodoro clock. pretty unstyled, I could say that maybe I got lazy, I still kinda hate styling things and writing CSS in general but that was no excuse. Anyway, I wanted to leave this as I submitted it also as a reminder that unstyled pages do not look pretty.

techs.description: A CSS library for responsive web design
techs.name: Bootstrap
